name: Dual sided Duels
description:
A double sided card game which has you playing two linked games at the same time

Heavily inspired by Inscryption

Rules are ingame, but for any questions/queries you can ask me on Discord at Nauviax#1283

Made in 48 hours for the 2022 Global Game Jam. The theme was Duality

More assets may be added later, but the game itself is functionally complete-ish. Some features were half implemented then dropped, and others we had to vastly simplify, (Like inbetween games,) but overall this turned out very well.

Made in Unity

Code by Nauviax and Beegsinjnacon

Art by Jabana

Music by Laura
